Description: Upper body sherd of Chian, possibly Simple Animal Style, pottery chalice with trace of rim; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim (mostly lost), glazed streaky brown below; exterior: at rim, band of dots between narrow brown lines, reserved below; inscription on exterior.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Temple of Aphrodite (Naukratis), Context Φ5
Curator's comments: 'Φ5' marked in pencil on the inside. Traces of a lost label.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0914) (phase 2)
